descriptionNullable:
This dataset contains the data for the paper "Deep learning based question answering system in Bengali". It is a translated version of SQuAD 2.0 dataset to bengali language. Preprocessing details can be found in the paper.
Link : https://zenodo.org/record/4557874#.YDVGxegzZPZ
Paper : https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/full/10.1080/24751839.2020.1833136
Authors : Tasmiah Tahsin Mayeesha; Abdullah Md Sarwar; Rashedur M. Rahman

sample :

title: Bengali Question Answering Dataset
subtitle: SQuAD 2.0 translated to Bengali language.
